title: Embroidered Picture, late 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: satin and stem stitch embroidery on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: Illustrating a biblical subject, the visit of the three angels to Abraham.  A servant of Abraham is washing the feet of one of the guests; two others are seated at a table that has been prepared under the tree.  Sarah appears in the door of her tent.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, late 16th century.
late 16th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: satin and stem stitch embroidery on plain weave. Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers. 2003-14-36.
